titles: The bucksome lass of Westminster, or, Her kind proffer of two hundred pound, together with a cargo of coals from New-Castle, to any young-man, that would in kindness help her out of a dead lift. Tune of, If love's a sweet passion. Licensed according to orde [sic].
publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, and J[ohn]. Back,
notes: Verse: "You lusty young batchelors pray now attend ..."
Place, date of publication, and publisher's names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
